comments: This is absolutely the best of its kind. I have never seen such a comprehensive, customizable, well-designed app that serves as many functions as this one. I've already shown it to multiple friends/therapists. For those of you moaning about the cost... seriously, getting the subscription will set you back just over $2/month. I work professionally with highly impoverished individuals who do have to count every penny, but come on. Most people can shell out a couple bucks without harm.

The app lets you log your mood, any symptoms you are having, and a number of factors that you think may be affecting your mood/symptoms. The default categories to log are good, but you can add/remove/edit all of the categories to fit you better. It's super easy to fill out, even when I'm not feeling well. It (sometimes) feels like I'm logging meaningless information, but then when I click on the Insights tab, it shows me tons of relevant information about which factors are influencing my mood (or any other symptom I log!). Turns out listening to music and video chats work wonders for my mood--good to know! This is also a wonderful way to record how I'm feeling over time--it lets me easily decipher long-term changes in my wellbeing, which is great information to discuss with medical professionals.

I really like this app, it's easy to use and the design is nice and the ability to customize it to your needs is great. However, the syncing isn't very reliable. I have a phone and a tablet, and downloaded it on both, I tried to log in on the tablet, and only a few entries were visible. Later I went to look at the one on my phone, and half the entries are gone, and so are factors I added. I want to keep using this app, but if it's going to randomly forget things that's a problem.

I have tried multiple times in the past to find a way that I could easily log my moods in a way that felt nuanced and meaningful but also flexible and customizable, but this is the first app I have ever seen that got it right. For once, I am finding it convenient to do quick check ins and even monitor my food and water intake which I never thought I'd have the patience to do. You don't have to get premium, but it's well worth it at least to support a great app.

Brilliant App & well worth paying for. I wanted an app to record daily symptoms to enable me to give an accurate report to my GP. This app has everything I wanted & more. Being able to write notes by each symptom is so helpful & the insight reports are incredible. I did have a little snag when I first signed up for the free trial, but I made contact, explained the situation & James helped me to sort it all out. The app has been fantastic ever since. Thank you bearable team 🙏🏻🥰

title: Flow - Depression
description:
Flow - Depression is a free personal guide to help you understand, treat & prevent depression and improve your mental health. Flow represents a new chapter in the understanding and treatment of depression, based on the latest psychology and neuroscience research.

Download to use the Flow neural stimulator headset for depression treatment. Create a personal account and follow the instructions to start using the brain stimulation headset. The Flow headset is an approved medical device (CE) for depression treatment in the EU and UK. Order it at: https://flowneuroscience.com

You can go through the complete treatment programme with or without a Flow headset.


The programme contains over 50 sessions split into 7 courses on these topics and more:

- Exercise​

Physically exercising to reduce and prevent depression has been shown to have a similar effect to antidepressant medication. Flow will tell you what kinds of exercise are most beneficial and what is the most optimal “dose”.

- Meditation

Managing stress is one of the most important things you can do. Meditation is practised by many people around the world as a mental “exercise” for the brain. Flow will give you concrete exercises to follow but also show you the neurological basis of why meditation is good for managing stress in your everyday life.

- Sleep​

Did you know that sleeping for only six hours each night for two nights in a row is equivalent to being continuously awake for 24 hours? Flow will educate you on sleep hygiene, why we sleep and why sleeping is one of four important pillars for overcoming depression.

- Nutrition​

The nutrition sessions will advise and encourage you to eat in a way that science has proven reduces inflammation in the brain, thereby alleviating depression. Spoiler alert: sugar is one of the big villains.

Also includes a depression test.

The most complete app for depression treatment has just gotten even better.
- Picture-in-picture mode allows you to use other apps on your phone while stimulating. Experimental feature only available on Android.

comments: I've been to therapy for years and done what this app does but paid a lot of money for it! Flow offers all that for free! This app is great so far. My headset is on the way and I'm hoping that it continues to help me get better. The app is easy to use and cleverly done.
Looks promising but I keep getting player initializing error message when trying to open videos on phone.

A brilliant and cmprensive app which works in conjunction with the Flow headset. The treatment program is effective in directing the user toward better sleep, eating more healthily and cultivating a positive and healthier mindset. This treatment system is not an easy option but it is effective in treating depression.

Device advises healthy eating, exercise, CBT to encourage you to get moving n out of the rut. Although that's not easy it's baby steps at first be patient you'll get there. Also suggests meditation, setting achievable goals, n to re value what's important to u. Also to give yourself a break not be so hard on yourself. I use it as an alternative therapy instead of medication. Personally think u need to use regularly to feel full benefit or prevent relapse. It helped me cope in difficult times.
Has helped with tools to cope with life. It is like a virtual mentor. A support and lifeline. Helps enormously.

title: Veterans Mental Health
description:
The Joining Forces Veterans Mental Health App is designed for Veterans of the British Armed Forces, providing information on mental health problems and highlighting where to get help. The lead clinician who fronts the app, Psychiatrist Dr Martin Deahl, who is also a serving Territorial Army Colonel, said: 

“We are extremely pleased with the feedback for our award nominated joining forces app and the request for something similar for service veterans. This new app has real potential to contribute to helping understand mental health issues, de-stigmatising and providing support”. 

South Staffordshire and Shropshire Healthcare NHS Foundation Trust are part of the national veterans network across the NHS and other providers.

title: Mental Illness
description:
Mental Illnesses are some of the most misunderstood illnesses that people can be affected by.  Many don't understand the severity of these types of illnesses and can be uncompassionate about the incapacitating affects they can cause to the suffers. 

Mental Illnesses not only take their toll on those who have to endure them but they also deeply affect the loved ones of those who are ill.  Dealing with someone suffering from a mental illness is not easy.  Sometimes the person you once knew seems to totally disappear underneath the effects of the illness and other times they require full time care in order to continue to function in daily life.

Yet, don't  despair and give up hope.  Many forms of mental illnesses can easily be diagnosed and controlled and the sufferer can go on to have a perfectly normal and functional life full of good mental health.  Learn more here in our sub section on Mental Illness about the many forms of mental illnesses and about what you can do to control and treat them.

title: Exercises to improve mental health
description:
Do you know what it means to have good mental health? Do you want to achieve balance between your body and your mind?
We have created a free application that will help you improve and take care of your mental health. An app that contains activities to take care of the health of your mind.
We call mental health the balance between a person's body and mind. Being healthy is not only about the absence of disease in the body, but also about finding psychological well-being. Having good mental health will help you cope better with different situations in life. To control yourself in adverse situations and establish good relationships with other people. Improving your mental health will increase your quality of life.
The rhythm of life that we lead today leads us to situations that produce stress and behaviors that decrease the well-being of our body.
The activities contained in these tutorials will help you improve psychologically and feel strong. It is as important to take care of your body as your mind, so finding a balance between the two will lead us to the well-being we are looking for.
What can we do to improve our mental health?
- You must be grateful.
- Accept the situation.
- Meditate daily.
There are exercises to take care of the health of and the well-being of our mind. Download our free application and find the balance you need.
Remember that taking care of your mind is as important as taking care of your body. If the state of your mind is weak, you will be more prone to stress, anxiety, depression,. . Follow the tutorials and achieve the well-being that you have sought so much.

title: OOTify Mental Health and Wellness
description:
THE REALITY:

Let’s be honest, today’s digital world is hectic. The job market and/or school, the news, the pressure to succeed, it all adds up. This constant pressure makes us neglect the most important thing in our lives—ourselves. Our days slip by unconsciously as we sink in the sea of distraction. Even when we try to swim, it’s hard to know where to go or, more importantly, who to ask for directions. That’s where OOTify comes in.

THE NAME:

OOT/UTH – उठ In Hindi, means to lift up, specifically lifting or raising up our community’s mental health.

THE CHOICE:

You have unique goals, and every wellness provider has a different approach to helping you reach those goals. That’s why OOTify offers the first 15 minutes with a mental health professional, mentor, or life coach for free.

This gives you the freedom to find the perfect match, pressure-free: you’ll never pay for a session until you feel comfortable with that person.

OOTify’s one-of-a-kind matching algorithm makes it easy to find the right life coach, psychologist, or specialized therapist to help you find your purpose and the motivation to live your best life. You can also search and schedule some time if you know what you’re looking for.

THE CONVENIENCE:

OOTify’s online counseling experience is personalized to your needs and available from the comfort of your own phone. With OOTify, there’s no wasted time calling and driving around. You have access to wellness providers who are available to provide support and guidance when and where YOU need it.

Don’t wait until the mountain is so high it feels insurmountable. Take control of your mental wellness on your own terms with the guidance and support that you need most.

THE RESULTS:

When we’re trained to prioritize demands from life, school, relationships or jobs over our mental and physical wellbeing, we end up curbing productivity and crippling our mental health. OOTify flips that model so that your mind can be balanced and healthy, letting you perform at your maximum level and unlock your best self.

THE COMMUNITY:

Join our warm, welcoming community today. Members enjoy the freedom to mindfully engage with others and share meaningful experiences, promoting collective mental wellness. Make each day count by lifting up someone around you.
descriptionHTML:
THE REALITY:

Let’s be honest, today’s digital world is hectic. The job market and/or school, the news, the pressure to succeed, it all adds up. This constant pressure makes us neglect the most important thing in our lives—ourselves. Our days slip by unconsciously as we sink in the sea of distraction. Even when we try to swim, it’s hard to know where to go or, more importantly, who to ask for directions. That’s where OOTify comes in.

title: Pixels - Mood tracker
description:
Pixels is a minimalist and powerful approach to bullet journaling. 

Track your mood in a simple, quick and easy manner. Every day is a Pixel! You can log your thoughts through notes and the emotions you felt.

Get insights and statistics of your mental health with its “Patterns” feature: examine your data with graphs and other analytics tools!

Use the app as a companion for your therapy or mental healing process. Pixels have been repeatedly recommended by therapists around the world.

Privacy and transparency are key. You are the only one with access to your data and the development of the app is transparent. You can read more about it in the FAQ section.

Ads are optional and non-intrusive! They, alongside the premium features, are just a way to support the development of this project.

Join our Discord community to get in touch with other users, get support and follow the development of the app!

You can also create a “Year in Pixels”, get reminders, customize the colors of your Pixels, secure your Pixels with a password, and more!


Original idea (Year in Pixels) from @PassionCarnets, go check her Instagram account! https://www.instagram.com/passioncarnets/

comments: There is nothing more I could want in a mood tracker. It is completely customizable, data-focused, and most importantly the app doesn't stress me out. I didn't even realize until now how other apps were designed to frustrate you with constant notifications, reminders, sudden ads, and odd paywalls until you give up or pay up. This is the first time I've been able to stick with mood tracking for more than a week.

This app is simple but does it well. I personally don't like that you can't save your data automatically, but I respect the reasoning behind it, and other, similar apps I have tried do the same. I LOVE how they handle ads. The fact that they are optional, and only offered when you had a good day is so pleasant. They probably don't profit off of it as much, but it's so respectful I can't help but watch the ads every time

I initially downloaded and used the app to track my mood so that I had something to reference when talking to doctors. That was almost 2 years ago and I still take a moment every night to reflect on my day. The free version was everything I need, but I make a habit to try and pay for apps without predatory payment options so I upgraded to the plus. If you want something simple to track how you've felt day to day, this is an excellent simple application to do just that.

I've been using this app for over a year now, and as someone with PTSD, it has helped track my progress, track and manage patterns in my mental health, and has provided a daily reminder to reflect for a moment on how I'm doing today. When I downloaded it, I didn't think it would become such an integrated and important part of my daily life, but it has! I love this app.

PIN doesn't work anymore. I made a back up to transfer to another phone, it made back up of the saved ones but it did not make a back up of the emotions I added before. There were lots but now the ones I added are all gone. :( I loved this app but it seems like it doesn't get updated anymore and felt like the creator doesn't care about this app anymore. :( searching for a better one now. It was great, but now it's not. Another 2020 low. :(

title: Better Mental Health
description:
Whether you are looking at improving your mental wellbeing, or interested in the mental wellbeing of others, Better Mental Health Magazine has something for you.

This insightful and illuminating magazine covers topics such as:
• General mental wellbeing
• Conditions
• Management and treatments
• Society and environment
• Mindfulness, exercise and nutrition

Better Mental Health Magazine is dedicated to covering a range of health and social topics specifically related to mental wellness, with a mix of expert knowledge and personal experiences. Better Mental Health Magazine is about you, me and everyone we know.

Download today and be inspired to achieve better mental health.

-------------------------------------------------

This is a free app download. Free app downloads do not include a free issue unless otherwise stated. The current issue, back issues and future issues can be purchased within the app.

Subscriptions are also available within the application. When a recurring subscription is purchased the latest issue will become available to download immediately.

Available subscriptions are:

6 months: AUS$4.99 / UK£2.99 / US$3.99 (3 Issues)
12 months: AUS$9.99 / UK£5.99 / US$7.99 (6 Issues)

- The subscription will renew automatically unless cancelled more than 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription rate for the product.

- You may turn off the auto-renewal of subscriptions through your Account Settings, however you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period.

- Payment will charged to your Amazon account at confirmation of purchase and any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased.

Users can register for/ login to a pocketmags account in-app. This will protect their issues in the case of a lost device and allow browsing of purchases on multiple platforms. Existing pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account.

We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved.
If your app will not load past the splash page after a first install or an update please click the settings cog, then click Settings then Refresh app data. If this also fails to work please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store

Help and frequently asked questions be accessed in-app and on pocketmags.
If you have any problems at all please do not hesitate to contact us: help@pocketmags.com

--------------------

You can find our privacy policy here:
http://www.pocketmags.com/privacy.aspx

You can find our terms and conditions here:
http://www.pocketmags.com/terms.aspx

title: Calm - Meditate, Sleep, Relax
description:
Calm is a leading app for meditation and sleep. Join the millions experiencing lower stress, less anxiety, and more restful sleep with our guided meditations, Sleep Stories, breathing programs, masterclasses, and relaxing music. Recommended by top psychologists, therapists, and mental health experts.

Calm is the perfect mindfulness app for beginners, but also includes hundreds of programs for intermediate and advanced users.

Guided meditation sessions are available in lengths of 3, 5, 10, 15, 20 or 25 minutes so you can choose the perfect length to fit with your schedule. Topics include:

* Calming Anxiety
* Managing Stress
* Deep Sleep
* Focus and Concentration
* Relationships
* Breaking Habits
* Happiness
* Gratitude
* Self-Esteem
* Body Scan
* Loving-Kindness
* Forgiveness
* Non-judgement
* Commuting to work or school
* Mindfulness at College
* Mindfulness at Work
* Walking meditation
* Calm Kids
* And so much more...

Also featuring:

* An original Daily Calm every day: a new 10-minute program added daily to help ease you into the day or unwind with before bed
* 100+ Sleep Stories: adult bedtime stories guaranteed to lull you to sleep
* 7 and 21 day programs for both beginner and advanced users
* Life-changing Calm Masterclasses taught by world-renowned experts
* Breathing exercises to help you relax
* Exclusive music engineered to help you focus, relax or sleep
* Unguided timed meditation
* Open-ended meditation
* 30+ soothing nature sounds and scenes to use during meditation, yoga or to help you sleep

Track your progress with:

* Daily streaks
* Time spent meditating

Calm is loved by the press:

* “I’m generally wary of meditation apps because they sometimes weave in too much mystic talk for my taste. But Calm instead contains guidance like ‘Concentrate on your body’” - New York Times

* “In the frenetic, crazy, digital world we live in, sometimes it's necessary to take a step back and smell the roses” - Mashable

* “Eliminating distraction...ended up helping me relax and realize that all the stuff I was stressing about wasn't that big a deal” - Tech Republic

* “Found myself similarly refreshed afterwards” - TechCrunch

Calm is free to download and use, and there are no ads. A subset of the programs and features are free forever.

Some content is only available through an optional paid subscription. If you choose to subscribe, payment will be charged to your Google Account at confirmation of purchase.

comments: I have used this app for over 4 years! I had the free version for a year and a half and loved it but wanted a little more. I use the paid version now. It doesn't cost anymore than any streaming service, actually cheaper than my Netflix and even Hulu. I'd give up both for this app if I had to. Helps with my sleep , my kid's sleep and our mental growth. I highly recommend using this!

Stopped before I even started. This app expects you not only to have to sign in and create an account straight away, but the "free" trial also requires you to sign up with an active credit card before you even get to experience anything. I personally hate this way of working and tend to turn away from all apps that insist on this model. Installed and deleted within ten minutes.

11th month update: Now I am trying to delete my subscription it is sooooo difficult. Unbelievable. I would never recommend this app. They have hidden the subscription change, created many bugs like your browser does not support... I am trying to unsubscribe using the app itself, but surprisingly it is not working because of java or smtng. Why you would need java to unsubscribe. You are trying to rob the users. Making it difficult so that they will give up, and you will continue making money

I tried the 7 days free trial and i found the meditation offered quite poor. Mostly too short and way too much talking, and not even in a soft spoken tone. I couldn't play any of its music in the background. Maybe my fault, but ok, since a lot of the music on offer is pop commercial singer stuff. I also didn't like the 'well done, set a reminder' type of approach. A meditation app should provide escape from the manic, 'like' addictive type of world, not mimic it. Disappointed

This app changed my life. It really helped me became a calmer person and have clarity. My mind is much more peaceful and have significantly less troubling and negative thoughts, even when I do have them sometimes, I'm able to distinguish them as just thoughts and not my reality. This is a really helpful app and I'm so thankful to the creators and all those who worked hard to get it working as good as it is.

title: MoodMission - Cope with Stress, Moods & Anxiety
description:
MoodMission helps you learn new and better ways of coping with stress, low mood, depression, and anxiety. Tell MoodMission how you’re feeling and it will give you a tailored list of 5 Missions that can help you feel better and improve your wellbeing. 

Missions are mental health strategies that are quick, easily achievable, and backed up by scientific evidence, including:
★ Mindfulness meditations
★ Relaxation
★ Exercise and fitness activities
★ Affirmations and coping statements
★ Behavioural activation
★ Yoga
★ Gratitude
And heaps of other proven mood boosting activities.

It's a simple as doing a Mission and boosting your mood.

MoodMission is based in cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT), which is an evidence-based psychological therapy for anxiety and depression. Anyone can use MoodMission, whether you just want a lift in your day or need a bit more help recovering from anxiety or depression.

A randomised controlled trial has shown that MoodMission can improve mental health and wellbeing (Bakker et al., 2019), and two other studies published in scientific journals have provided further support (Bakker & Rickard, 2019; Bakker et al., 2018). Randomised controlled trials are the gold standard of scientific evidence, and very few available mental health apps have RCT support (Firth et al., 2018).

Completing Missions earns you rewards in the app, motivating you to take steps towards becoming healthier, happier, and more confident. Plus a Mission log helps you track your progress over time.

MoodMission learns which types of Missions work best for you, so the more you use MoodMission the better it gets at tailoring your Mission suggestions.

MoodMission is not a replacement for professional help. If you are experiencing anxiety, depression, or any mental health issue, talk to your GP or contact a psychologist for support.

title: Mindspa: Self Help 4UR Mental Wellbeing & Wellness
description:
Are you often feeling sad, lonely, doubtful, or frustrated? Are you also frequently emotionally burdened by guilt, distrust, jealousy, envy, shyness, apathy, and other complex feelings? 

Do you want to improve your life, increase your emotional intelligence and feel calm, relaxed, confident, and overall happier? If meditation, Yoga, and other mindfulness practices are not for you, it’s time to coach yourself a little psychology.

Welcome to Mindspa – the all in one app for your mental health wellbeing.

Using a variety of psychology based self improvement articles, self assessment tools, mental wellness workouts, and life improvement courses, we help you cope with difficult emotions in order to make your life better.

Say yes to personalised and professional self development and see your life grow daily. 

💯 SELF GROWTH & MENTAL WELLBEING ARTICLES
Find resources, mental wellness tips, and tools to familiarise with your emotions, to better understand your needs and to help you focus and to achieve your desires, for your personal life as well as your relationships with others. We provide practical advice and accessible tools to support your mental wellbeing every day.

✍️ PERSONAL DIARY & STATS
Use the in-built mood and psychotherapeutic diary to track your moods, emotions, or situations in your personal life that inspired you or make you feel down. Use it as a self assessment tool to improve your overall mental wellness. Statistics and analytics will help you identify the areas where you need to work more.

💡 PSYCHOSUTRA - SELF HELP WORKOUTS
As a self coaching app, Mindspa features mental workouts for many negative feelings such as shyness, envy, loneliness, apathy, anger, frustration, anxiety, resentment. All mental workouts are neatly divided and feature tasks that you need to perform for long-term self improvement.

📖 PERSONAL DEVELOPMENT COURSES
Whether you want to develop a new skill like become more attentive or confident, or overcome mental conditions like anxiety or the constant feeling of negativity and sadness, the Mindspa Courses can be of great help for your mental wellbeing. 

🆘 EMERGENCY CHATBOT
Are you having a panic attack? Your anxiety is overwhelmingly high? Have you had an argument with your partner or a family member? Are you having troubles coping after a traumatic event? Do you need to vent away but no one is there to listen? Use the Emergency section and let's talk it over. We guarantee you that you'll feel better after a therapeutic chat. 

☑️ BOOST YOUR MENTAL HEALTH WELLBEING & EMOTIONAL WELLNESS WITH: 
- Articles, cases and tips, covering psychology themes and real life events;
- Diary, a psychotherapeutic journal with daily submissions and useful analytics;
- Psychosutra, an impressive collection of coping-skills techniques for working with feelings, emotions and specific conditions;
- Courses, enrollable online programs with psychotherapeutic tasks on dedicated topics
- Personality tests, to help you determine which tools are right for you;
- Emergency, a chatbot simulation to support you in critical situations;
- And much more...

Start a positive shift in your mental wellbeing now!

Psychoeducation is often the first step for mental health improvement, and it consists in providing information and support to better understand and cope with a certain condition or emotionally straining circumstance. While it does not substitute psychotherapy, Mindspa can be a powerful complement to classic therapy, and it can be a great tool where a psychologist help is not easily accessible or affordable. 

🚀Download Mindspa – the best wellbeing coach for personal growth & emotional intellect!


In case of issues or questions, don't hesitate to get in touch with us - write us at contact@mindspa.me

title: FeelJoy - Mental Well-Being for Anxiety
description:
Are anxiety, low self-esteem and depressive thoughts bothering you? Have plenty friends but no one to talk to? Feeljoy Buddy is here to support you! Here, you can interact with individuals who are available to talk to you in real time. Learn more about self-care and self-reflection in an ecosystem designed by Feeljoy for the very purpose of helping you cope with the stressors of daily life and promoting emotional wellbeing. Feeljoy Buddy is your new Mental Health companion.

Good at counselling others? Been told that you’re a good listener? Think you can help others by helping them vent out? Want to help promote the idea of Mental Wellness and Mental Wellbeing? Be a Buddy with us and support others' well-being by being an effective listener.

COMPANIONSHIP
•	Connect with *The Buddy*, your all-time support system.
•	Gain a good listener who is always ready to help.

INTROSPECT THE INNER YOU
•	Self reflection through others' experience.
•	Gain knowledge on your own psychology and therapy.

ANONYMITY
•	An app that guarantees anonymity.

TOP FEATURES
•	Customized
•	Anonymous
•	Connect to a Buddy (free service)
•	Self-Help area
•	User friendly
•	Quick screening assessments: to help you identify problems and get a personalized plan through a Coach

CHARGES
•	FREE

BOOST YOUR HAPPINESS WITH OUR EMOTIONAL WELL BEING APP
•	Learn how to effectively deal with you problems.
•	Learn how to let go of unhealthy coping mechanisms. 
•	If you ever feel exhausted and drained, you have a buddy to listen to all you have to say. 
•	A judgment free zone where you can openly discuss all your problems while staying anonymous. 

*PRODUCT DESCRIPTION*
Everyone faces problems like anxiety, depression, sadness in their daily life but we usually end up keeping it all to ourselves because of various reasons like fear of judgment, fear of rejection, not wanting to “burden” our friends with our problems and the list goes on. Stressors and problems are a part of life that tend to throw us off balance more than we realize. Given our super busy lives, we rarely pay attention to signs of deteriorating mental health, let alone put it to check. Talking it out and sharing your thoughts serves as a great remedy to all such problems. 

Feeljoy Buddy helps you cope with the above problems and gain self-esteem by assigning you a Buddy who’ll listen to all you have to say as well as supporting you. Receive help from individuals who are ready to help. After all to be healthy as a whole, mental wellness plays a very crucial role.

o Talk to your Buddy
o Magic, the friendly bot     
o Therapy with your Coach 

Follow Us:
Web – https://feeljoy.in/
Blog - https://feeljoy.in/blog/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/feeljoy.in/
Facebook – https://www.facebook.com/feeljoy.in/
Medium - https://medium.com/@feeljoy.in
Twitter – https://twitter.com/wefeeljoy?lang=en
Quora - https://www.quora.com/profile/Feel-Joy-1?ch=99&share=fa8b8d0e&srid=uBzYP
Mail - feeljoy.in@gmail.com 

Download FeelJoy, your mental wellness and mental and emotional wellbeing companion: Find your Buddy, your mental health companion. Let go of all those unhealthy coping mechanisms and start moving towards positive mental health.

comments: I have tried so many times and exit in the start only cause I still have not received my invitation code.
This is an amazing app for anyone who wants to deal with their anxiety,wants a safe place to talk about their feelings or just learn to be a happier person . Absolutely loved it !!

It's been yesterday...I have got no response from this app...also there is no option to go back and modify your choices...for an app which is meant to deal with mental and anxiety issues I am really disappointed with the outcome.
A great app with great experience. Keep it up

It is an amazing app and that help you deal with anxiety through different ways like with the help of experts or self help feature. it is an great initiative. It provide solutions to many of the issue related to anxiety and remind that we are not alone in this and we are strong to deal with situation.It is accessible and user friendly. Wonderful app. Highly recommended 10/10

title: eMoods Bipolar Mood Tracker
description:
Your privacy matters! eMoods never stores ANY of your data in the cloud or connects to any APIs.  No data ever leaves your phone without your explicit action.

Managing your mood just became easier and more effective!  eMoods is a private and easy to use mood tracker and diary for journaling, graphing, reporting, and managing symptoms related to Bipolar, Depression, Anxiety, and other mood disorders.  Start tracking, notice your triggers, and take control of your mood and other symptoms!

eMoods is a mood charting journal perfect for logging Bipolar I, Bipolar II, or any general kind of mood tracking!

eMoods allows you to send a monthly PDF report to your doctor

eMoods is a free mood tracker app that lets you easily chart your daily highs and lows/depressed and elevated moods, sleep, medications, and other symptoms related to common mood disorders like Bipolar/Manic Depressive illness. 

Email a printable PDF report at the end of each month to your doctor or caregiver to help you identify triggers or other events that could lead to an episode or relapse.  View in-app graphs and printable charts to track trends and visualize your symptoms and triggers in between appointments.

eMoods now includes a dark color theme and a colorblind-friendly color scheme.

Mood journaling is part of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and other treatments for bipolar, depression, and other mood and anxiety disorders.  Use this app with your doctor.

This app is for charting daily extremes of moods and other symptoms, and does not log multiple moods and other symptoms per day.

All features from version 1 of this app remain free.  Patronage is strictly optional.

recentChanges:
Google Fit integration
Hide medications graph when no medications configured
comments: I've been using this app for years! It is absolutely perfect in every way but there's still an issue that hasn't been fixed yet although it has been said before. I have more than 10 mood tracks that I track every day and whenever I try to send a PDF report of the month to my therapist it doesn't cover all of the moods that I track. It cuts many of them out. This has been a problem for me from the start and it's sad because i track many things that I just can't share in my therapy :/

This app couldn't be more perfect. It is absolutely worth the purchase. Most mood apps are overwhelming and lacking, but this app does exactly what I want it to do - track bipolar moods, sleep, menstruation and weight, add custom items, export to CSV and more. It's a simple, versatile, no fluff format that takes less than a minute to fill out and I can even set a reminder so I don't forget. Seriously, thank you. This app is truly helpful for those with bipolar and other mood disorders.

Love this app. Have tried several different apps to track mood and anxiety. The interface so easy to use. I love that I can add custom tracking points like energy, if I did exercise or pain levels. Graphs are nice and clear, easy for support staff to understand.

Been using this for a couple weeks. It's been helpful in tracking my mood and compliance with medications. Also gives me a place to state any triggers or issues I encountered the day that have impacted my mood. My only gripe is the automatic backup being to Dropbox. I would prefer to be able to choose where these backups go to.

A good tracking app, I have been using it for a year or so, just got the upgrade last week or so. I haven't had any issues until recently, when I tried pairing my Google Fit app. They have fixed my original issue (not seeing past graphs), but issue still remains about not displaying Google Fit data in their respective graphs. I am more anxious for the ability to pair Fitbit with this app (especially once all issues resolved around graphing).

title: Aurum - best therapy app, stress, anxiety.
description:
Welcome to Aurum, the platform which provides the best professional mental and emotional wellness ecosystem. Now manage your stress, anxiety, worry through our very popular programs. Get affordable therapy and access to expert psychologists through our app. Our users love us because we make it so easy and convenient to get access to quality care and help. All our professionals are based out of India and are vetted qualified experts. Go on and be the best version of yourself. Right away. 

Programs -
These are specially designed self-educating modules based on proven techniques like Cognitive Behavior Therapy(CBT), Mindfulness, Meditation and others which will help you learn the skills to cope with your issues. Be it stress, anxiety or relationships, you can learn at your own speed and master the skills required to face these problems. The best part is you will always have your coach - who is a certified psychologist, available on chat. Your coach will guide you throughout and help you achieve emotional and mental stability.

Therapy -
There are various incidents or situations in life where we can't seem to find our way out. The mental and emotional pressure becomes too much to handle. If you feel like you are going through a tough period of grief, sadness, anger, stress, anxiety, depression, worry etc connect with one of our qualified therapists at a fraction of the cost of traditional therapy. Your coach will be there for you round the clock, making sure you live your life in the best way possible. Getting access to a professional psychologist has never been so simple, easy and affordable.

*Now share positive affirmations with your loved ones and develop a positive mindset and learn how to have positive thoughts with expert guidance and self-help tools.*

We have created an entire ecosystem for you to get all the things necessary to become the best version of yourself. Solutions for Depression, CBT, Positive Affirmations, Life Coaching, Positive Mindset, Loneliness, Relationships, Mindfulness, Meditation, Therapy. Download now!

comments: Very good therapist Zeel. It's helped me a lot. Thanks.I loved the app, it has quite a few simple but useful features. I am using anxiety program. It has helped me understand my anxiety in a simple way. Still halfway to go but it's quite helpful.
Wonderful app. It has large catelog of exercises and activities. My counselor was Mrs. Madhavi Adhvaryu who really helped me to control my anxiety and develop positive attitude in life.
Nice app. The counselor I got I.e Madhavi Adhvaryu is very good and supporting. But there is problem with the speed of the app.

I had really high hopes for this app but i get an error every single time i try to load the introduction video. If this can be fixed then i'll change my star rating. Some other functions work and some dont. Please please fix!!!

The experience has been good, as soon as I got into the app, for a much lower price then many counsellors you can have no limited chat and with a fee, which I didn't use can place phone meeting half an hour each. It's nice because you can switch between counsellors if you're not feeling satisfied and there are in the counselling section some guided exercises and articles for several purposes. Note that the price differs between therapy and program, being in this way affordable for more people.

title: Shine: Calm Anxiety & Stress
description:
**2019 Google Play Award Standout Well-Being App & 2019 Webby Award Winner for Best Lifestyle App**

Things are hard right now—get the daily support you need with the Shine app, the #1 self-care app created by women of color. 

With the Shine app, make caring for your mental and emotional health a habit. 

Learn a new self-care strategy every day, get support from a diverse community, and access an audio library of 800+ original meditations, bedtime stories, and calming sounds to help you shift your mindset or mood.

Join millions of people who experience lower stress and anxiety after using Shine. Plus: Support a Black-owned business and our mission to make mental health more accessible for all. 

How it works:

**LEARN NEW SELF-CARE STRATEGIES**

Start each day with the Daily Shine. Every weekday, listen to the latest episode of the  podcast-meets-meditation—to learn new ways to rest, heal, and grow.

Then: Journal what you’re grateful for and how you’re feeling to receive recommended articles, meditations, and exercises based on your mood.

**DISCUSS WITH THE COMMUNITY**

Reflect on the Daily Shine with the rest of the community and get support from each other. Answer the day’s Daily Discussion question to see how other like-minded members are taking care of themselves. 

**EXPLORE THE AUDIO LIBRARY**

Search the library to find a meditation that fits your needs or browse the library to find recommended challenges and meditations.

Shine’s audio library offers over 800+ original meditations, bedtime stories, and ambient music. Plus: Meditations specific to the mental health challenges faced by members of marginalized groups.

Topics include:

Black Wellbeing
Calming Anxiety
Reducing Stress
Confidence
Growth
Improving Sleep
Focus
Burnout
Forgiveness
Self-love
Motivation
Creativity
Finding joy
Managing work frustrations
Strengthening relationships
Creating healthy habits

**GROW WITH CHALLENGES**
Go deeper on a topic with a series of meditations that help you grow.

**SHINE IN THE PRESS**

“Best Anxiety Apps If You’re Fully on the Brim of Freaking Out” - Cosmopolitan

“Shine: the self-care app that teaches you to ‘hustle more mindfully’” - The Guardian

“Best apps for parents in 2019” - TODAY Show

summary: Meditation & motivation
recentChanges: If things feel overwhelming right now: You’re not alone. Our new update includes an Election Anxiety playlist, full of meditations to help you soothe and ground yourself during this season of uncertainty. Plus: We’ve added some new polish to the app to make it easier on the eyes. Like the update? Leave us a review. Take care, and be sure to register to vote at vote.org.
comments: I really have been enjoying the SHINE App. This is my first year of using SHINE. The subscription prices are reasonable and I would advocate for it if you like the free dailey morning audio meditations and readings, I love it that it has audio meditations, check-ins, a calendar to track progress, noon and bedtime meditations, and a library However, I would appreciate the ability to use the same subscription for the Android and iPhone so that progress can be synched between devices. Thank you.

I'm in love with this app for so many reasons. I love the gentle nudges that keep me coming back, the enormous amount of support I feel with being given options to journal or talk it out, and most importantly that the voices I hear are from BIPOC.

I try to use this app every morning to start the day. It has a variety of deep breathing exercises, mindfulness, positive affirmations, and much more. They tailor to your needs based on the questionnaire given at the beginning. I'm enjoying this app so far!

This is a great app for supporting mental health and the challenges we face in modern life. It is my go to app for stress and anxiety relief. The fact that it exists lets me know I am not alone, I am part of a community of people who experience the world as it is and are working to make it live up to its promise. Thank you Shine!

I like what I see in the free version even though most features are locked for premium. Unfortunately I will be uninstalling because at $54 a year it's a little expensive for me but I am sure it would be worth it. Great app overall.

title: Mental Health Telugu

title: Mood Time - Mood Tracker, For Your Mental Health
description:
This Easy, Mood-Tracking App helps you overcome mood issues, so that you can have a life worth living! Finding the right Mental Health App is tiring, and it leaves us feeling overwhelmed with all the choices. It shouldn't be this hard to find a straightforward mental health app! We feel your pain. As a therapist for over 10 years, I have helped many clients struggling with mental health issues. Therapist have science-based ways that we track progress over time, and none of the apps get it right. Finally, I created this app to help you get there. 

Follow These Simple Steps:
1. Download the App
2. Track Your Mood Each Day
3. Enjoy tracking your progress and/or share with a therapist.
4. Experience a more peaceful and happy life! 

What Are the Benefits?
-Easy and Simple to Use
-Daily Reminders to Track Your Mood
-Calculates the Intensity of Emotion 
-Tracks the Number of Hours You're Feeling Down
-Shareable Data to so that You and your Therapist can have the Best Information

It would be difficult to know how much you are progressing in therapy without the Mood Time App. If you have a therapist, they will need to spend valuable time asking questions or filling out annoying questionnaires. Wasting time is the last thing you want to do during a counseling session. 

You don't have to feel overwhelmed when battling the negativity that life throws at you. With the Mood Time App, you can be the kind of person who lives a fulfilling and happy life. Download the App Today!

comments: Excellent app to track my daily moods. I love the part where I get alerts to update my mood. I think this app will help me in the long run to get into the right moods everyday.
This is mental health app is perfect! It even helps me track how long I've been feeling sad during the week. It's so easy to use so I can easily have it be a part of my day.
Amazing mental health app! So much easier to use than other mood tracking apps and the animations are cool!
This is a great way to help preserve self care & mental health in this season. Designed by a counselor for everyday use.
Good and simple but it's need more upgrade 😊

title: Fabulous: Daily Motivation & Habit Tracker
description:
▌ Winner of Google's Material Design Award for Most Charming Engagement
 
▌ Nominated for Google Play’s Best App Award
 
▌ Incubated at Duke University Behavioral Economics Lab
 
Fabulous is not just your average habit tracker! We’re a science-based app that will motivate you to improve your fitness & achieve your weight loss goals, reboot your sleep cycle, and discover mindfulness to reduce your anxiety. You’ll learn to build a transformative morning routine and even pick up life-changing habits like meditation and yoga along the way.
 
Our ultimate goal is to instill habits that improve your health.
 
Using any random habit tracker to pick up a habit like yoga, meditation, or to serve as a reminder to workout never works. This is why we’ll act as your life coach, building your motivation so you can focus on developing habits that reduce mental health issues like anxiety, and improve your daily productivity.
 
Upgrade your planner for an exciting new habit tracker and achieve your health and productivity goals today.
 
Use Fabulous for motivation to build a refreshed morning routine, exercise, improve your sleep cycle, and lose weight. Start by instilling these healthy living habits that will improve your mental health and keep you on top of your goals.
 
Like we said, Fabulous is not just your average habit tracker. Fabulous is your motivation to workout and lose weight, your morning routine jump start, your mindfulness app to help you relax and focus, and so much more.
 
▌TOP 6 REASONS TO USE FABULOUS
 
★ Have an irregular sleep cycle and want to learn how to get a good night sleep?
★ Struggling with your fitness and don’t know how to lose weight?
★ Need motivation to build an indestructible morning routine?
★ Want to increase your energy so you have focus the entire day?
★ Find it difficult improving your productivity because ADHD?
★ Want to improve your mental health through mindfulness so you can cope with anxiety?
 
▌INTEGRATED HEALTH SESSIONS
 
Take your fitness & workout routine to the next level by trying our integrated exercise sessions. We’ll coach you through each of our sessions and more!
 
★ 7-minute scientific workout to improve your fitness so you can lose weight
★ Zen and vipassana meditation for high anxiety and mindfulness
★ Deep work and power nap sessions for productivity and focus
★ Stretching starter pack for total flexibility  
★ Yoga exercises to reduce anxiety and improve your mental health
 
After you’ve created your morning routine, you’ll begin to receive personalized vocal advice from your own personal life coach based on your everyday habits.
 
▌HOW FABULOUS WORKS
 
★ Smart-targeted health advice to develop an exercise routine and improve your fitness 
★ Science-based habit tracker focused on health and mindfulness
★ Weight loss workouts that don’t just rely on counting calories (based off the Atkins & HCG diet)
★ Your own personal 1:1 life coach for motivation to achieve your goals
★ Integrated health sessions for meditation and relaxation, yoga, exercise and more
★ Tools to improve your sleep cycle so you can have a good night sleep
★ Expansive library to improve your productivity & focus, and build a successful morning routine
 
▌GET IN TOUCH!
 
We're always happy to talk with you and hear how fabulous has improved your mental health and helped you achieve your goals from meditation to weight loss, and so much more!

Shoot us an email at hello@thefabulous.co
Like us on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/thefabulous.co
Follow us on Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/thefabstory/

summary: Proven to Sharpen Your Brain, Skyrocket Your Productivity & Enhance Your Life 👍
recentChanges: After a Fabulous 4-hour creative deep work session, we're thrilled to announce the launch of Daily Coaching. This valuable new tool provides inspiring stories to help you reach the finish line each day, and whether you prefer to read or listen - daily coaching is a great way to kickstart your day with inspiration.
comments: It's a good app, but the alarms aren't as customizable as I'd like, and some of the elements are a little confusing. It took me way too long to figure out how to delete and reorder things, it's not as intuitive as HabitRPG. That being said, it's nice to have a community to participate with- or not. Either way is acceptable, and no feeling left out or pushed in. Useful tool for helping serious change, one day at a time.

This app is amazing, but geared heavily towards women. As a person trying to build a more masculine frame and personality using this app seems a little bit counterproductive to my goals. In my opinion, this app would receive a 5-star rating and high praise if it were gender-neutral. Over all, a very good app. Clean interface, detailed, motivatinf, and easy to use.

It's a really sleek and informative app. I'm just on the trial bit so far so good :-) I wanted to add - after two years of using this app, I am finally beginning to live the life I know I deserve and have worked so hard to achieve. The Fabulous has been an invaluable tool in helping me stay focused and achieve goals one step at a time. Thank you so much ❤️

This app has given me space to do something just for me, which as a new mom can be tricky! I really like the journeys and goals and habits, but I find that the interface isn't super user friendly and I often find features by accident and then have no idea how to get back to them. Maybe I need to play around more, but it would be nice if there were less hidden nooks and crannies, so to speak. Overall, love it and am so thankful for it!

I uninstalled this app from my phone recently, then found that I had paif £45.99 for a year's premium at 50% discount. I have no recollection of this....... but no proof either. I've just cancelled all pre-approved payments on Paypal to avoid anything like that happening again. In the meantime, I've got use of the app for another 12 months and so might as well use it. It's not worked brilliantly for me - it's basically a habit tracker.

title: TheraNest
description:
Therapy notes software to take your practice with you on the go! TheraNest is used by practices and organizations of all sizes: sole practitioners, large mental health and psychology practices, social service, and educational and teaching centers. Unlimited users per practice. Top-notch customer support. 

Enter therapy notes from your Android device. HIPAA compliant mental health practice management app for therapists, counselors, psychologists and social workers. Mental health software to manage and grow your practice. 


With TheraNest for android you can:
- Manage your schedule and appointments
- Securely access client information
- Upload images to client files 
- Complete Progress Notes, Initial Assessments and Treatment Plans
- Access top notch support and much more

Security Features:
- HIPAA compliant
- Automatic timeouts to protect your data
- Auto-lock when app is closed
- Client access control by administrator
- Audit logs, etc

Its a work in progress, but still extremely helpful for private therapeutic practices.
Unfortunately, I have to uninstall the app due to many limitations. Going there from the browser is more efficient.
Password reset issues. Just a horrible app.
Easy to work with and let's me update case notes where ever I happen to be

title: PsyTests
description:
This APP contains psychological tests about several issues that patients often consult to every professional in Psychology. Its content is simple to understand and very useful. You will be able to learn, consult, and evaluate many characteristics about your personality and also if you suffer from anxiety disorders, mood disorders, eating disorders, addiction problems, etc. In addition, there is helpful information about love, related subjects about relationships, about who you are and how your psyche works. 
All the tests of this APP have been developed thanks to the hard work together of a group of Professionals of Psychology. 
Choose a test and start to know more about yourself.

title: eQuoo: Emotional Fitness Game
description:
What happens when a psychologist teams up with the creators of The Walking Dead games? Introducing eQuoo, an EVIDENCE-BASED and captivating choose-your-own-adventure game that increases your emotional fitness and teaches you new psychological skills, helping you level up in real life. 

Become a master people person by learning tips and tricks about emotion and effective communication. Our clinical trial showed that a level a week builds resilience, boosts relationship skills, supercharges your personal development AND lowers anxiety! These key skills will help you take control of your life, maintain your mental health and achieve success in work and relationships. Put your newfound knowledge to the test in engaging mini-games designed to help you understand your personality and identify your areas for growth and personal development. Download now for free!

FEATURES: 
- Evidence-based through a clinical trial 
- Significantly builds resilience - the strongest predictor against developing mental health issues
- Boots interpersonal relationships skills - become the people person you want to be and wow friends, family, and partners
- Supercharges personal development - get ahead in work and uni
- Lowers anxiety - eQuoo gives you skills to help challenge anxious thought patterns
- Apply your new skills in choose your own adventure games to unlock insights about your personality and progress to the next level
- Learn where you lie on the Big Five measures of personality and what this means for you

Download eQuoo for FREE to discover your inner power.

recentChanges: Made some updates and took care of bugs
comments: I have only just started this game but from what I have seen and played so far I am very impressed, not only with how it is layed out but also how it explains things to you and you get to make choices on how you would react and explains your answers to you.. I have learnt about myself already.. Thank you for a great app..

I haven't yet played it much, so cannot give it full marks. Will review again at a later date. So far though, graphics, game play, speed, storyline, etc are all good. It even gives you psychology tips and assessment information on your profile. It'd be good to see what I make of it once I search up all the terms they have mentioned.

It's a good app to explore what the big five personality types are but I do not think it's a good representation of what your big five results actually are. The testing is from a multiple choice storyline where some of the answers are in a right/wrong format. It also claimed to be based from clinical research, which in turn does not make it good or bad

Good idea, poor execution. The writing needs a lot of work. Most of the answers are ridiculous, and some of the "right answers" seem socially inept -- which works against the whole point of this game. For example, why would you need to tell a suspect that you're not the "best chief of security"??? The personality test questions also lead to wrong conclusions, because they're not based on what you would choose in real life, but what you think the character you're playing as should choose.

I appreciate the art style and how the education is not too text book. It seems culturally relevant and easy to follow. The lessons are easy to understand and I appreciate the practice that comes after. Immersive experience of trying to get it right using the tools learned is really cool.

title: MedCircle
description:
Understand the mental health conditions that matter to you. Access the world’s greatest minds in mental health through engaging, interview-style video series, and other in-depth content.

 

With new content released each week, MedCircle’s award-winning video library gives you “behind-the-scenes” insight from the most sought-after psychologists and psychiatrists. You’ll learn what certain diagnoses entail and get unprecedented insight into the processes that experienced doctors use to diagnose them. You’ll also understand treatment options, the risks, and benefits each doctor considers when prescribing, and how they go about providing therapy and/or medication. 

 

Features: 

 

Access in-depth video series on the following mental health topics: 
addiction
obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD) and hoarding disorder
personality disorders such as borderline personality disorder (BPD), antisocial personality disorder (ASPD), narcissistic personality disorder (NPD), schizotypal personality disorder (STPD), schizoid personality disorder (SPD), paranoid personality disorder (PPD), avoidant personality disorder (APD), obsessive-compulsive personality disorder (OCPD), dependent personality disorder (DPD), and histrionic personality disorder (HPD)
schizophrenia & psychotic disorders
trauma & post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD)
treatments and therapies such as cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), dialectical behavior therapy (DBT), acceptance and commitment therapy (ACT), somatic experiencing therapy (SE), electroconvulsive therapy (ECT), hypnotherapy, and more. 
Relationship issues
Mental health in children
Family mental health

Access in-depth video series featuring patients with lived experiences on a variety of mental health conditions in order to get a firsthand look at what it’s like to navigate certain disorders 

Get the insight you need to better navigate the mental health care system, and even better navigate your relationship with your mental health provider

Discover the strategies and tools you need to better take care of yourself, your family, and those you support in the short- and long-term

Stream from your computer, tablet, or phone anytime 

Customize your viewing experience to include only the topics you would like to learn about


Access the entire video library by upgrading to an All-Access membership. 

To access all features and content you can subscribe to MedCircle on a monthly or yearly basis with an auto-renewing subscription right inside the app.* Pricing can vary by region and will be confirmed before purchase in the app. In app subscriptions will automatically renew at the end of their cycle.

* All payments will be paid through your Google Account and may be managed under Account Settings after the initial payment. Subscription payments will automatically renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current cycle. Your account will be charged for renewal at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current cycle. Any unused portion of your free trial will be forfeited upon payment. Cancellations are incurred by disabling auto-renewal.

Terms of Service: https://www.medcircle.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://www.medcircle.com/privacy

comments: MedCircle is an amazing organization all by itself and that fact that they have brought there extraordinarily informative videos to this easy to use app format is absolutely incredible. I have had the app for weeks and use it regularly even downloading some videos to listen to while on my camping trip and everything has worked seamlessly. Thank you for your dedication to helping educate those of us who can't necessarily afford to see a mental health provider.

Overall, the MedCircle content is excellent. With regard to the app, it's a must download. Love how easy it is to find particular videos and then I can stream them to my Google home or television. Definitely makes the videos more accessible.
Informative, enlighting and useful and educational.
Very lovely and informative. This has helped me immensely become more educated on my own conditions as well as the conditions of people around me. Worth the money.

This is a very useful source of information for related to psychology and health, whether it be mental, emotional or physical. This has helped me answer some questions of my own and helped me start to take the next steps in fixing my problems. Plus watching their interviews let's me know that I am not alone!

title: The Zone: Daily Self Care & Gratitude Journal App
description:
The Zone is a home for your thoughts, emotions & mental health. 😇

HEAR IT FROM OUR COMMUNITY

"So far, i love it!! it's the best journaling app that doesn't make you buy subscription!"

"Thank you for this app because of your app I'm feeling relaxed and happy. Really the best UI for journaling I've ever seen. Im grateful for finding this app 😊"

" For an app that released less than a month ago, it is absolutely incredible. I've tried probably around a hundred journal apps over the past two years, and this is by far the best one."

START FEELING BETTER NOW

comments: I absolutely would recommend this to anyone and everyone. If you are like me and struggle to deal with anxiety, depression, self identity, stress, self esteem, etc. you should download this app. I thought it was silly at first, but after a while I noticed that it provided me a place to jot down my thoughts in a way that was easy to do. I suddenly noticed a great decrease in depression. This was because I was able to get all the negative thoughts out and start getting the positive in. Thank you!

So i love this app but i have to big complaints. One it shows that the dream diary and vision board options are available and they are not. The other is i lost my daily writing strike for nothing. In my writings you can clearly see the dates yet it takes it away from me? Idk. I love it other then that its just aggravating

Just loved the simplicity of the app. Best journalling app I have ever seen. For me, Its the world's best place to express my thoughts and emotions. Its analytic feature is amazing. Thank you : The Zone.. for giving such amazing service.

Great app, a lot of thought has been put into it. I would highly recommend this app to anyone who wants to get better at being able to control your Attitude/Mood/Emotions. ●Edit: I have not been able to journal anything down for a handful of days, everytime I'm in the loading phase, it automatically force closes the app.

This app just blew me away. I rarely rate/review apps, but this was way too well deserved to ignore. The UI, the writing prompts, the emotion cards, the creative passion put forth in the making of this app is very much so obvious after 5 minutes of working with it -I completely forgot I was using a self-care type of app. THEN, you went ahead and slapped the "analytics" portion on me like a cherry on a sundae! Idk you, but I'm so grateful for you. Thank you DEVs! -Madelyn

title: Mental illness - Treatment
description:
We often encounter people who are in bad shape, dirty clothes and strange behavior. Many people feel very frightened when approaching them. They call them "madmen." They are scientifically referred to as psychotic patients with mental illnesses or disorders. 
Symptoms of mental illness
There are many general symptoms that appear on people with mental illness:

    Act strange and surprising around him with his abnormal behaviors.
    Not knowing what is going on around him, such as time and time, since he does not care about time and does not feel it.
    Not caring for himself in general, and his personal cleanliness in particular.
    Loss of awareness of what he does he does not know why he behaves this way or what to do.
    May do some dangerous behavior on himself and on others, and can exceed the other words or already.
    Hearing and seeing things that are unreal and exist only in his mind, which leads him to speak with fictional characters.

Types of mental illness

There are many mental illnesses that can be divided into several types based on the main causes of this mental illness:

    Organic diseases resulting from a problem in the brain, such as imbalance in the brain and its cells.
    Functional diseases As a body member is unable to function normally.
    Toxic diseases, such as poisoning in some organs of the body as a result of the treatment of toxic substances.
    Mental illness may be caused by a deficiency in the amount of certain vitamins in the body, or a lack of mineral salts.
    Diseases associated with external causes, such as a strong blow to the head, causing concussion, sunburn, or various types of drugs or alcohol.
    Mental illness in children, due to problems during pregnancy.

Examples of mental illness

    Schizophrenia.
    Obsession.
    Bipolar disorder, characterized by two directions in which either joy and excessive movement and feeling euphoria, or severe depression.


The mental illness is characterized by the existence of disorders, mental illness characterized by the existence of psychotic disorders, and the mental patient is different from the mental patient that he is a scientist in his condition and that he is sick and does not imitate the characters, and his behavior is acceptable, and hallucination scare And the behavior of a person is not very clear. It is not socially acceptable, and it is often the hallucination that he lives and believes as if he reality .



Mental illness

Medical conditions involving changes in emotion, behavior, and thinking are referred to as Mental Illnesses. These diseases are associated with problems, difficulties in social, family or work activities, and mental or mental illnesses As treatable.
Types of mental illness

There are some types of mental illness, including the following:

    Anxiety.
    Late dysfunction.
    Autism disorder.
    Schizophrenia.
    Post Traumatic Stress Disorder.
    Personality Disorders.
    Obsessive-compulsive disorder.
    Multiple eating disorders, such as anorexia, or bulimia.
    Dual diagnosis.
    Personality disorders schizophrenia.
    Seasonal Affective Disorder.
    Bipolar disorder.
    Tourette syndrome.
    Attention deficit, hyperactivity.
    Panic disorder, or panic attacks.
    Depression.

title: Bipolar Test
description:
Bipolar Disorder is a mental disorder that causes shifts in a person's mood, energy, and thoughts. People with bipolar disorder experience high and low moods (mania and depression, respectively) that are more extreme than what people typically experience. This can lead to a lot of stress and problems with family, work, money, and the law. This app contains a self-report questionnaire to help screen for symptoms related to bipolar disorder. It also contains information to help you get a better understanding of this mental illness.

Bipolar Disorder Test is designed to evaluate your symptoms of bipolar disorder with a scientifically-supported 15-question test. It uses the Mood Disorder Questionnaire (MDQ), a screening questionnaire for bipolar spectrum disorder that is commonly used in research and healthcare settings.

Bipolar Test contains four tools:
- Start Test: take the MDQ questionnaire to screen for bipolar disorder
- Result: understand your test results and get resources tailored to your result
- Information: learn about bipolar spectrum disorder and discover additional resources that can help you on your path to recovery

Disclaimer: The MDQ is NOT a diagnostic test. A diagnosis can only be provided by a qualified healthcare professional. Please consult a physician or mental health professional if you are concerned about bipolar disorder. 

References:

Hirschfeld, R. M., Williams, J. B., Spitzer, R. L., Calabrese, J. R., Flynn, L., Keck Jr, P. E., ... & Russell, J. M. (2000). Development and validation of a screening instrument for bipolar spectrum disorder: the Mood Disorder Questionnaire. American Journal of Psychiatry, 157(11), 1873-1875.

comments: I have the diagnose but the questionnaire results said I don't which is srsly bad if someone has it and takes this test they will think all is good and maybe not seek help for it in time. I have type 2 which is more hard to detect and the app just copied the most common questionnaire for screening but usually theese questions are combined with more screenings to further evaluate if you have it not so all in all this app is misguiding for ppl who don't know this.

Hi, taking this 'test' as a person professionally diagnosed with bipolar one. First I wanna say that it only dives into mania/hypomania, which would not be as useful to my friends with type two. Its also quite lazy, and directly copies questions used to determine if screeming is nessacary. If you're taking it for fun go fornit I guess, but talk to a professional if you're having concerns.
only asks questions relating to mania and hypomania. doesnt even touch on the depression side of bipolar disorder
Good app! Check it out!
My brother always said he thinks I got bipolar I took this test I think u might have it I'm going to tell my brother and friend to see if they can help overall a amazing app

title: Smiling Mind
description:
Smiling Mind is a unique web and app-based program developed by psychologists and educators to help bring balance to people’s lives.

Just as we eat well and stay fit to keep our body healthy, mindfulness meditation is about mental health and looking after the mind.

Smiling Mind is a 100% not-for-profit organisation that works to make mindfulness meditation accessible to all.

Our vision is to help every mind thrive.

Our mission is to provide accessible, life-long tools to support healthy minds.

Our programs are designed to assist people in dealing with the pressure, stress and challenges of daily life. 

We offer programs for:
- Adults
- Kids & Youth (3-18 Year Olds)
- Sleep
- Classrooms
- Sport
- At Work
- Some Indigenous Languages
- & Much More

Illustrations by Beci Orpin and The Jacky Winter Group

recentChanges: In this update we are excited to announce a whole new category for health workers.
comments: Easy to use; accessible and very blind friendly; thank you. It's getting very hard to find an app that isn't overloaded with unlabeled images, buttons, and circular sliders. Thanks for a straight-from-the-hip, getter-done meditation app. You're welcome. I'm really grateful that the reminders are verbal as well. Most apps seem to think that visual reminders are enough, but blind people don't have the luxury of looking at their phones constantly, so thanks for talking to me.

An excellent, totally free mindfulness app. Smiling Mind covers everything from children to teenagers to adult mindfulness foundations, with a variety of specific targeted mindfulness courses of all sorts to help with different areas like sleep, stress, relationships, work - etc. I've been using it for years and it's wonderfully ad free. As for mindfulness itself, I cannot recommend it enough. If you're curious, Smiling Mind is a perfect place to start.

This app is so great when it works. It gets quite glitchy when it comes to member login and member data. It will not let me reset my password because apparently my email address is not present in the system but I am unable to register a new email address because I'm already registered in the system! When I was still able to login it would randomly delete my data and programs/progress. It will also sometimes just freeze in the middle of a meditation.

I like the meditations however I dont like the layout and navigation of the app. A lot of the meditations are too similar, cant skip and have a long intro that I dont want to hear every time. The app logs me out often too and I have to login, which is an annoying inconvenience when I'm trying to relax to sleep. I fell asleep to it and it kept playing the whole night for 8 hours. And just then I was listening and it kept skipping to the beginning. It was rather creepy actually and now I'm on edge

This app is amazing and has helped me to sleep again. I was relying on a number of medications to sleep but the guided mediations have drastically changed that for me. I cannot thank everyone involved in this enough, so I'm going to donate as well. Thank you so much for making such a wonderful tool freely available and without ads, it really has changed my life 😘

title: Student Health App
description:
"Reliable, relevant health advice for young adults who want to look after themselves and use medical services wisely" (Dr Dominique Thompson, Director, Students' Health Service, University of Bristol).

Concerned about a health problem? Not sure what to do next? Too embarrassed to seek help? The Student Health App (previously known as 'ESC Student') allows you to say goodbye to frustrating, confusing and sometimes dangerous online searches for health information. What's more, the app works offline (apart from the hyperlinks), so you can use the app on-the-go without the need for an internet connection.

How does the app help? Open the app and easily access over 900 pages packed with reliable health information - anywhere, anytime, and in private:

•	Troubling health problems – check out what to do next and when to see a pharmacist, nurse or doctor
•	Emergencies and general ill health – discover the truth about life-threatening illnesses as well as sleep problems, feeling stressed, and being tired all the time
•	Common ailments – get to the bottom of headaches, find out how to treat your spots, and manage common aches and pains
•	Mental health – find out what to do when you (or one of your friends) feel low or anxious, self-harm or are worried about drinking too much alcohol
•	Useful links – get fast access to hundreds of links to useful further information

Which topics does the app cover? The Student Health App offers plain-talking reassurance, info and advice on over 125 topics relevant to students in areas such as...

> first aid & emergencies
> common ailments
> mental health problems
> physical (body) symptoms
> love and sex
> healthy living
> travel health
> alcohol & drugs
> long-term health problems
> staying safe at uni
> accessing health services…

...and more.  

Is it safe? In partnership with the University of Bristol Students' Health Service, the app has been co-created by medical doctors and students and is certified by the NHS England Information Standard as a source of clear, reliable and relevant health information. 

Can universities have their own version? We can customise the app for universities - visit www.expertselfcare.com for details. We also review and update the app continuously, at no extra charge. 

Are other student-facing apps available? You may want to check out our 'distrACT' app, offering support for young people who self-harm or feel suicidal. Other new student apps are in the pipeline, addressing student wellbeing and the needs of international students. 

How do I find out about new apps? Stay tuned and like us on facebook (www.facebook.com/expertselfcare), follow us on twitter (www.twitter.com/expertselfcare) and sign up for news through our website (http://www.expertselfcare.com/news/).

How can I give feedback? We will always try to improve this app further, and we'd appreciate your feedback. Please take time to rate the Student Health App on Google Play and complete a short anonymous feedback survey from within the app. Thank you!

Download your Student Health App today for quick, easy and discreet access to reliable health information!
