comments: So far this is excellent. I was recently diagnosed with depression and need to keep track of my symptoms as well as effects of medications. Most of the other apps have a pre-set list of symptoms, and user is limited to those symptoms. This app allows you to create your own labels for symptoms, so you can be very specific with tracking your health issues. Also, the app creates a nice graph for visual representation of your symptoms. This app is exactly what i needed.
I was searching for a log which seemed to be quite difficult until I found health log. You can add symptoms to the list, and pain levels. Just what I wanted.

HELP option needed. It does everything I need so far. Had to read 100+ reviews to find developer comments to learn how to use, how to edit, etc. A "how to/help" in the dropdown menu is missing. Also, haven't yet figured out tracking >1 person. I got this to track my kid but would like to add myself. Overall it works well so far. Also, I haven't upgraded. Access to the full version (3day trial) would probably yield more upgrades. If full is just ad removal I'm ok with ads
Good pain track and has a calendar view. Handy for a cancer patient like me. I haven't upgraded so far but i'll see in a few days when i need to backup.
Really useful to track so I can keep my doctors up to date. However this morning when I went to sort categories it crashes everytime! EDIT: All fixed! Rating edited to 5 stars.

title: Psychiatric Nursing Exam Prep
description:

You can get the best practice before your psychiatric nursing exam with huge number of psychiatric nursing / mental health nursing questions which covered all the topics of your psychiatric nursing / mental health nursing syllabus with this App.

This Single App covers Mental Health & Psychiatric Nursing Questions for all of the Following Nursing Related Exams .
 
* Mental Health & Psychiatric Nursing Exams.
* Comprehensive Exams.
* Nursing Licensure Exam(NLE).

* NCLEX-PN

App Features:

title: Depression Test
description:
Are you feeling sad or irritable, overly tired, or in pain? Do you feel your mood affecting your relations with friends or family?  If yes, then you must consult with a mental health professional to ensure your mental health and medical condition. Because maybe you are depressed or have bipolar disorder. 

Generally, depression is a terminology that is used to describe the bad week at work or if we’re going through a breakup type condition. Depression has many types like clinical depression, experiencing depression. 

But the type of depression that is more complicated which is somehow similar to experiencing depression is known as Major Depressive Disorder. 

As you know there is no reason to be suffering in silence and harm yourself with no cause. Every situation has specific conditions, similarly with the depression. There are some specific symptoms that are helping to determine the depression over the sadness we experience in life.

 Take the depression test to discover your options; you should also take the bipolar test for better results. Prepared by mental health professional these bipolar test and depression test are completely anonymous and trustworthy. 

Experiencing depression is considered as a serious medical condition which can harm your health if you doesn’t consult for treatment with a mental health professional If you’re medical condition is not good than depression can cause to harm these medical conditions:

Arthritis
Asthma
Cardiovascular disease
Cancer
Diabetes
Obesity

title: Mental Illness Assessment Tests
description:
Mental Illness Self-Assessment Tests & Psychological Tests and Quizzes is a FREE tool to assess mental health issues patients from all over the world are experiencing. The quiz based approach help you understand if there are any clinical signs of anxiety and mental disorder. 

Its content is simple to understand and very useful. You will be able to learn, consult, and evaluate many characteristics about your personality and also if you suffer from anxiety disorders, mood disorders, eating disorders, addiction problems, etc. 

In addition, there is helpful information about love, related subjects about relationships, about who you are and how your psyche works. 

Knowledge from Professionals of Psychology directly to you

•	Colon Cancer Self-Assessment Quiz To know if you Show Any Clinical Signs Of Colon Cancer 
•	Self-Assessment Screening For Agoraphobia Anxiety Disorders 
•	Suicidal Thoughts Disorder Test 
•	Jealousy Test - Do You Possess All Qualities To Become A Perfect Life Partner Or Are You A Jealous Abusive Careless Person Compared To Your Partner 
•	Orgasmic Disorder Test Anorgasmia Test 
•	Schizophrenia Test
•	Couple Communication Quiz How Effective Is Your Communication With Partner 
•	Anxiety And Post Traumatic Stress Disorder PTSD Test 
•	Gambling Addiction Test For Those Suffering From Compulsive Gambling Addiction
•	Drug Addiction Test To Check For The Signs Of Drug Dependence Addiction And Abuse 
•	Anxiety Disorder Test 
•	Emotional Dependency Test 
•	Color Blindness Tetrachromacy Test 
•	Psychological Abuse Test If You Feel Your Partner Is Emotionally Abusing You 
•	Fear Of Commitment Personality Assessment Test (Gamophobia) 
•	Sexual Desire Disorder Self Assessment Test - Are You Suffering From Hypoactive Sexual Desire Disorder (HSDD) 
•	Anorexia Noervosa Test 
•	Eating Disorder Test 
•	Toxic Relationship Assessment Test 
•	Sex Addiction Test 
•	Anxiety Disorder Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder (OCD) Assessment Quiz 
•	Lesbian Quiz - Are You Lesbian 
•	Gay Test - Reveal If You Are Gay Bisexual Or Straight 
•	Food Addiction Test
•	Teenage Depression Quiz To See If Your Teen is suffering from depression 
•	Erectile Dysfunction Test For Men
•	Social Anxiety Disorder (Social Phobia) Assessment Quiz
•	Super Color Vision Test Are You Gifted With The Very Rare Tetrachromacy Eye Condition
•	PTSD Test - Quiz To Check If You Are Suffering From PTSD Post Traumatic Stress Disorder 
•	OCD Magical Thinking Test - Religious Beliefs And Magical Thinking  
•	Mesothelioma Signs Quiz 
•	General Mental Health Checkup Assessment To Understand Your Depression Anxiety Phobia PTSD And Stress Level 
•	Alcohol Addiction Test
•	Free Depression Test To Find Out Low Moderate Or Severe Depression Levels In You 
•	Female Sexual Arousal Disorder Test Is Self-Assessment Approach To Know If You Or Your Body Are Developing Related Signs 
•	Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD) Test 
•	Self-Assessment Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD) Test 
•	Philophobia Test Fear Of Falling in Love Personality Assessment 
•	Assertiveness Personality Test
•	Detection of Drug Use Addiction Test 

Based on the test results, if you are worries about your mental health, we recommend to immediately consult with your Doctor or Psychiatrist so they can review your medical history along with the results of this test and suggest treatment plan.
If you have suicidal thoughts, immediately contact National Suicide Prevention Lifeline - 1-800-273-8255. The line is available 24 X 7 and support in both English and Spanish language is available.
Warning : This is to make it clear that the medical information on this app doesn’t substitute a doctor’s advice.
This information is for educational purposes only, and not meant to provide medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Remember to always consult your Psychiatrist or health care provider before starting, stopping, or altering a treatment.
descriptionHTML:

title: Anxiety Disorder Screening Test - GAD-7
description:
Anxiety and anxiety disorders are the most common mental health conditions in the field of psychiatry and psychology. There are a variety of tests which measure anxiety but the current gold standard test in psychiatry in the GAD-7 Anxiety Disorder Screening Test.  

The GAD-7 is a simple test 7 question self-assessment which asks the user to consider how he/she has felt over the past two weeks and then rate the severity of his/her anxious symptoms. 

The app includes a detailed definition of clinical anxiety.  The app also includes some simple coping techniques for dealing with anxiety and information about medications used in the treatment of anxiety.
descriptionHTML:

The app includes a detailed definition of clinical anxiety. The app also includes some simple coping techniques for dealing with anxiety and information about medications used in the treatment of anxiety.

title: HeadUp - Anonymous stories and mental health tests
description:
HeadUp is a platform for change our mission is to build  transparency around the issues of mental health and recovery.The aim is to build a community that is a safe space for people to discuss the difficult things that they are going through and get advice and help before their mental health deteriorates.Its also to help people going through various mental illnesses share their experiences about recovery and receive support and positivity through this journey.

In honor of the journey's of our users we are happy to help you share your stories anonymously because we believe every story needs to be told and that in being told these stories will help others living similar realities to cope.
HeadUp is a place to suggest helpful content to help others learn more about mental health or dealing with difficult situations.

The app covers depression, abuse, anxiety and other types of difficulties that users can share content under.

Content includes videos stories and articles which can help other users acquire more information or lift their mood.

Also offers depression and Anxiety tests

title: AIMS for Anger Management
description: AIMS is designed for Veterans and military Service members but can be used by anyone coping with anger problems. The AIMS app is based on the Anger and Irritability Management Skills online self-help course (http://www.VeteranTraining.va.gov/aims/). The app provides users with education about anger, opportunities for finding support, the ability to create an anger management plan, anger tracking, and tools to help manage angry reactions. Users can also create custom tools based on their preferences, and can integrate their own contacts, photos, and music. The AIMS app may be used alone, or in combination with the online course or in-person therapy.  AIMS was created by VA’s National Center for PTSD and VA’s Mental Health Services.

And I can freely express my anger without having to hear some useless advices. Overall, this app has helped me in dealing with my slight anger issues.

this is a FREE app, simple to use, very fast and accurate way to learn diy CBT. I would love this to expanded for All kind of options not just anger. full Mark's to developer teams. keep it up♡♡♡

title: Be Mentally Strong Tips
description:
Free and offline app,

The Habits of Mentally Strong People , Physical and mental health goes hand in hand. For a strong body, you need an equally strong mind. It will not only help you reach your fitness goals, but will serve you well in a range of human endeavors and activities. Here are some of the habits and practices that mentally strong people, including some of the world's top athletes, do.

Being emotionally and mentally strong, or resilient, means adapting well to things like stress, trauma, adversity, or tragedy.Resilience is not something you are born with — it is a process that can be learned by anyone, and is found in ordinary people.

Being emotionally strong doesn't mean you don't experience pain or suffering — resiliency is often learned when one is faced with an extremely painful situation. What it does mean is that you learn to rebuild or "bounce back" from these experiences.

Emotional and mental strength are what makes women more powerful and more adaptable to any environment but not everyone was lucky enough to learn the skills that can be harnessed from these unique strengths.


If you're here wondering exactly how to know how to be more confident, how to have better self - esteem , more self worth, then you've come to the right place! Self Confidence can be a mixed bag, have too much and it can look like arrogance , have too little and it can look like you have low self - esteem! This guide is aimed at helping reach a healthy middle amount that is both genuine and reliable.

Whether in your day-to-day life, or during the course of achieving something great, you will find yourself swept up in all sorts of emotions: anger, frustration, sadness, etc. Do not let these feelings get the best of you and your dreams. While you cannot help how you feel in reaction to something, you can determine how you let these emotions affect you. Always take a movement to breathe and think deeply about why you feel the way you do and whether you should let something get to you. 



* Features:

- Updated regularly
- You can ask questions to us for more idea about content.
- Simple  book Knowledge like pocket on your phone
- SEEK THE RIGHT KIND OF ATTENTION
- FOLLOW OTHER STRONG WOMEN
- DON’T WAIT AROUND FOR SOMEONE TO SAVE YOU
- FREE YOURSELF FROM THE VICTIM MENTALITY
- Ways to Think Like a Genius
- The Psychology of Genius.
- Easy Ways to Enhance Your Creative and Genius Potentials.

title: StressScan: heart rate monitoring and stress test
description:
Just place a finger over the camera for two minutes, and StressScan will analyze changes in your heart rate interval and scientifically measure the level of your mental and physical stress on a scale of 1 to 100.

- What is the principle behind StressScan? − 
Many of the functions essential to maintaining human health are controlled by the autonomic nervous system. It is medically recognized that the balance of the autonomic nervous system can become disordered through fatigue and other stress, stemming from causes such as work and human relationships. By analyzing the waveform of your heartbeat as measured at the fingertip, StressScan can analyze the balance of your autonomic nervous system and measure your stress level on a stress index of 1 to 100.

- You can trust Stress Scan! - 
The technology used by Stress Scan is based on heart rate variability analysis, which is widely recognized in the field of heart rate analysis and autonomic nervous system research. 
Although heart rate variability analysis technology is not yet generally well known, many medical institutions and companies have taken an interest and are beginning to put it to use. The technology is seeing use even at the cutting edge of stress care, including adoption by the US military to treat post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD) in soldiers returning from the battlefield, and by NASA for astronaut training and health management.

- Usable in a range of scenarios! - 
· Periodic checking of daily stress level
· Checking the effects of favorite meals and drinks on stress
· Checking relaxation while traveling or at a favorite spot

- Device compatibility -
StressScan is intended for use with a camera- and flash-equipped smartphone. It is not usable with devices that do not have a camera and flash.

- Usage environment -
An Internet connection is required to use StressScan. External support for measurement functions is used for complex stress analysis.

comments: Scanner takes 3 minutes and if it thinks your finger moved at all it restart. It can be very frustrating and obviously a probability towards the accuracy of the final scan. I'm still sticking with it I'm going to give it a 30-day trial I'm halfway through that. I find it useful but I do think that you should be able to add more tags.

This is a good app. I compared the results using Samsung Health stress meter ( I use a Note phone which has a heart rate monitor), and they were fairly accurate. Even the heart rate was accurate to the beat if 2-3 beats per minute. I tested in resting conditions, after exercise, ( where the HRV is minimal, so stress is maximum) and Samsung Health stress results and this app results match perfectly.

This app's heart rate is pretty accurate, but the stress level is just useless. Even if I measure in the middle of a severe panic attack, it says I have low stress. Half the app is in English, half is some Asian language. Not recommended for stress measurement

The ability to use camera for heart rate is very innovative. The app checks the variance of the heart rate from the median and has some predefined set of calculations to get the percentage. This may not be accurate way to calculate mental stress, but the condition of the heart. However, the bpm shown is perfect. So 4 stars, but 1 star less because the stress percentage is not always accurate. It shows different values when taken one after another for me.
This is a must have app. It helps you to monitor your stress levels! The monthly calendar is great so you can see how well you are doing at managing your stress. High recommend!

title: Tell A Buddy - Online Counseling & Life Management
description:
Dealing with issues at workplace? Bogged down by Stress? Facing Relationship Issues? Worried about career? Are you experiencing adolescent or parenting Issues? 

Sometimes life is a battlefield. You find yourself alone, confused and hopeless – it’s hard.

In situations like these you need someone to talk to online or online counseling with certified professionals – and there is no better life management app & online counseling tool than Tell A Buddy! It’s the easiest way to talk to a therapist online and handy tool for life management and self-improvement.

We like to call it the next big thing is online therapy!

PRIVATE LIFE COUNSELING APP
Tell A Buddy is created for moments of psychological despair and consists of people who will walk the journey with you and help you. Our life-counseling app is discreet; where anonymity is constantly upheld regarding your emotional feelings and information shared. Get professional help & online psychologists from various field in an easy convenient manner.

TALK TO SOMEONE ONLINE
When mental problems or life problems struck, often the person is feeling alone or afraid to share them with someone. With Tell A Buddy you’re never alone; this online life management app offers the best online therapy, and tons of ways to get through any situation you’re facing. Take that first step towards your emotional wellbeing. Find what works for you, and the motivation to continue forward will come with a great life management tool like Tell A Buddy. 

SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE
Your situation and problem my come from different categories of life. From relationship problems with the people you love, to troubles in school or with friends – Tell A Buddy is useful for all fields of life and for all age groups. Just pick a private chat with an online therapist for online mental health counseling and start your process to therapy. 

Don’t need private online therapy and you just seek advice or opinion about a problem you are facing? Then use the group chats feature of Tell A Buddy.

Features: 
• Private chats with professionals who are experts in Counselling and Therapeutic work.
• Various categories for group chats – Friends, School, Family, Girls Talk & Relationship
• Support groups
• User-friendly 
• User Profile options

Services
• Career Counselling
• Depression
• Family Difficulties
• Anxiety
• Social Anxiety
• Self Development
• Panic Attacks
• Relationship Problems
• Grief and bereavement
• Anger Management
• Work/Life Stress ect..

HOW MANY SESSIONS CAN I HAVE? 
• Unlimited.

No matter if you need online relationship counseling, online psychologist or just someone to talk to online, Tell A Buddy is your best solution!

It’s a tool for all fields of life. A tool that can really change and improve your overall well-being and change your life to the better.

Get ultimate professional help, download this life management app.

title: Stop Panic & Anxiety Self-Help
description:
LEARN TO CONTROL PANIC AND GET RELIEF FROM ANXIETY

Self-Help for Panic Disorder

The info in this app assumes that the user is suffering from panic attacks due to Panic Disorder. It may not be applicable to other forms of anxiety. It focuses on the fear of having a panic attack and the fear of the sensations when having a panic.

CONTAINS
***Articles about panic/anxiety and cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT)
***Anxiety Cognitive Diary to learn to challenge fearful thinking
***Emotion Training Audio to learn to access calming states
***Relaxation Audios to learn deep relaxation
***Panic Assistance Audio to coach through panic attacks
***Password protection available

NOTE: All audios can be downloaded from ExcelAtLife.com

Use Panic Assistance audio to coach you when you experience a panic attack and to help you learn to tolerate and control the anxiety symptoms. Also, can be used to assist with exposure therapy for Agoraphobia.

The Panic Assistance audio is not a relaxation or hypnosis audio. It is meant to be firm so as to get your attention while having a panic attack. Relaxation or hypnosis audios are not very useful during a panic. They may be useful to prevent panic, but this audio is focused on reminding you that panic won't harm you and that you can tolerate the unpleasant sensations of panic.

Emotion Training audio can be used as relaxation or you can use it to learn how to access emotions such as calmness or strength when you need to. The audio trains the brain to pair the emotions with certain colors and once you have learned the process, you can elicit the emotions you desire by imagining the paired color flowing through you.

Links to articles at ExcelAtLife.com to help you understand the cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) approach for anxiety and Panic Disorder. 

The general idea of CBT is to repeat rational statements that challenge the irrational fears until the rational beliefs become stronger than the fears. Since it is difficult for a person to do this while having a panic attack, the panic assistance audio in this app helps you to do this. This self-help method can provide the coaching many people need to cope with panic. However, some people may need therapeutic help in addition to this.

Use the relaxation audio to improve your anxiety management skills. Learn to reduce stress and to relax your body using Qi Gong and additional relaxation audios by Excel At Life.

Also, look for "The Worry Box" app for audio to create imagery to reduce worry and related anxiety.

Reason for permissions:
1) READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY--necessary when listening to audios to pause playback when phone call is received (Excel At Life never accesses identity)
2) MODIFY DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS--necessary to allow saving data to SD card
3) FULL INTERNET ACCESS AND VIEW NETWORK STATE--necessary to determine if internet access is available when linking to articles and audios

***Anxiety Cognitive Diary to learn to challenge fearful thinking

***Relaxation Audios to learn deep relaxation
***Panic Assistance Audio to coach through panic attacks
***Password protection available

NOTE: All audios can be downloaded from ExcelAtLife.com

Use Panic Assistance audio to coach you when you experience a panic attack and to help you learn to tolerate and control the anxiety symptoms. Also, can be used to assist with exposure therapy for Agoraphobia.

The Panic Assistance audio is not a relaxation or hypnosis audio. It is meant to be firm so as to get your attention while having a panic attack. Relaxation or hypnosis audios are not very useful during a panic. They may be useful to prevent panic, but this audio is focused on reminding you that panic won't harm you and that you can tolerate the unpleasant sensations of panic.

Emotion Training audio can be used as relaxation or you can use it to learn how to access emotions such as calmness or strength when you need to. The audio trains the brain to pair the emotions with certain colors and once you have learned the process, you can elicit the emotions you desire by imagining the paired color flowing through you.

Links to articles at ExcelAtLife.com to help you understand the cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) approach for anxiety and Panic Disorder.

The general idea of CBT is to repeat rational statements that challenge the irrational fears until the rational beliefs become stronger than the fears. Since it is difficult for a person to do this while having a panic attack, the panic assistance audio in this app helps you to do this. This self-help method can provide the coaching many people need to cope with panic. However, some people may need therapeutic help in addition to this.

Use the relaxation audio to improve your anxiety management skills. Learn to reduce stress and to relax your body using Qi Gong and additional relaxation audios by Excel At Life.

Also, look for "The Worry Box" app for audio to create imagery to reduce worry and related anxiety.

Reason for permissions:
1) READ PHONE STATE AND IDENTITY--necessary when listening to audios to pause playback when phone call is received (Excel At Life never accesses identity)
2) MODIFY DELETE SD CARD CONTENTS--necessary to allow saving data to SD card
3) FULL INTERNET ACCESS AND VIEW NETWORK STATE--necessary to determine if internet access is available when linking to articles and audios
summary: Self-Help Methods to Learn to Control Panic and Anxiety
recentChanges:
4.1.2 Fixed showing saved entry instead of new entry
Fixed date issue
comments: I use this app daily. In addition to informative articles, there are a variety of audios. I especially appreciate the one on anxiety attacks - I'm prone to them - and it works every time. In addition, there's also a cognituve diary/journal and you can have access to an online source as well. I highly recommend this app.

I just downloaded the app and haven't had a chance to use it, but what stands out immediately is that an anti-anxiety app should perhaps try for a bit calmer, simpler look. The font and colours are actually making me anxious. I'll still give it a shot, but a more minimal look would go far in improving user experience.

I have experienced real support from this app, when caught up in anxiety in middle of the night, as well as relaxing before going to sleep. Therefore very disappointed that it does not work anymore on my new phone...

This app has helped me so many times in calming me when panic strikes. Its as if Im sitting in the therapists office and she talking me through the entire attack. Wonderful self help tool and you choose if you want music or not, which I prefer not. It also has many different audios you can choose for your liking. I very highly recommend this app.
The best help for panic attack I've ever found! I use it for assistance and I'm learning to tolerate my bad thoughts and fisical reaction caused by panic attack. Thank you so much

title: NCMHCE Clinical Mental Health Counselor Exam Prep
description:
Upward Mobility presents our National Clinical Mental Health Exam Prep app, with over 300 review questions designed to help you study for the NCMHCE exam administered by the National Board for Certified Counselors.

This is the ideal study tool for those working toward certification in Counseling, Clinical Mental Health Counseling, or the Military Health System. It also makes a perfect review guide for those pursuing careers in social work, therapy, psychiatry, and psychological services administration.

Our targeted multiple choice questions include detailed explanations to help reinforce your comprehension of the material. All our questions were written exclusively for Upward Mobility. 

The practice questions cover all the necessary content areas required for NCMHCE certification:
– Assessment and Diagnosis
– Counseling and Psychotherapy
– Administration, Consultation, and Supervision

Our exclusive and intuitive UI provides three different practice modes: 
– a Study Mode that helps you learn at your own pace with instant feedback
– a Test Mode that lets you time yourself and choose the topics you want to study
– a Review Mode to go over your answers and see what you missed

Upward Mobility is an independent test-prep company that creates high-quality material at low cost, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by writers who are subject matter experts. We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you. We are neither affiliated with nor endorsed by the NBCC or any other organization.

title: Mental Health Application
description: The App is for making people aware of the challenges or rather mental issues people face and encounter as individuals, which some of we don’t even know about as victims. Some of these issues are known and at some point, people don’t think they are/or could be faced with someday. Some don’t even know about these issues and their signs may seem normal to an ordinary human eye, not thinking and considering the damages it could be causing to the mind in any way. Most people believe that mental disorders are rare and happen to someone else. In fact, mental disorders are common and widespread and they need us to know them for us and also for someone else we know who might be going through the same issues as the ones addressed in the App. We are people and we are not always good, so if it does not happen to you or affect you, know it for someone else who might be in need of help. A cry for help is not always loud and visible, sometimes it’s silent and needs someone to listen so that they could get help.

title: Mood, Emotions & Activities Diary - Year In Pixels
description:
With Daily Mood your life is at your fingertips!

If you want to:
• monitor your feelings and mental health 🙇
• track your day-to-day activities ✍️
• know what affects your mood and have useful statistics about your progress 📈

...than Daily Mood is the app you are looking for! 

Our goal? To help you improve the quality of your life and mental health!
How? Through a daily record of your moods and feeling, and the subsequent better understanding you'll have of yourself, thanks to the associated analytics. It's s easy as that :)

From one of our users:
"Your app has actually really helped with my recovery. Being able to notice patterns in my mood over the past 5 months has been really beneficial and i've learnt a lot about myself and what triggers my anxiety/depression. [...] I really SEE i'm improving and recovering and honestly tracking my mood at the end of the day is one of the things I look forward to the most."

Daily Mood allows you to:
• register how you’re feeling at any given moment choosing among 7 different moods and more than 150 emotions (you can also add your custom ones!) 
• track your daily activities
• add your own thoughts about each registered mood, and see them all in the "diary" section
• have insightful statistics in the "Year in Pixels" view (e.g. the mean mood associated with each emotion/activity, and how many times you registered a certain mood, or you felt a specific emotion/did a specific activity)
• know which activities often trigger specific emotions, thanks to the "Often together" section in the statistics
• have a visual intuitive representation of how were your days thanks to the color associated to the mean mood of the day (being able to choose among 8 different palettes for the colors of the moods!)
• easily add/modify/remove moods, emotions and activities of past days
• keep track of your life day count, to never forget how precious is everyone of them
• easily create backup files and import/export data, also in PDF!
• secure your data with a pin code to access the app

Of course this journey will take time, but Daily Mood is here to assist you: you'll be helped by daily inspirational quotes and wonderful backgrounds, all within a beautiful layout and an intuitive user interface! 🌄🌌

Please note that this app is still under development, every feedback is kindly accepted! 

Upcoming features: different background themes, add a photo to each entry! 🙌

used for 3 minutes so far and already had 3 ads. this doesn't help with moods!
easy to use. hopefully going to come in handy learning my triggers

title: Abnormal Psychology Books
description:
Abnormal Psychology Books is an application that contains a collection of theories about abnormal psychology offline. There are hundreds of abnormal psychological theories accompanied by psychological case studies and their problem solving.

You can learn abnormal psychology by using this application. The abnormal psychology application is specifically designed for the world community to more easily study abnormal psychology.

This Abnormal Psychology book is a free application. Our appreciation for giving constructive criticism and 5 stars.

Introduction to Abnormal Psychology
Abnormal psychology is the branch of psychology that studies unusual patterns of behavior, emotion and thought, which may or may not be understood as precipitating a mental disorder. Although many behaviors could be considered as abnormal, this branch of psychology typically deals with behavior in a clinical context. There is a long history of attempts to understand and control behavior deemed to be aberrant or deviant (statistically, functionally, morally or in some other sense), and there is often cultural variation in the approach taken. The field of abnormal psychology identifies multiple causes for different conditions, employing diverse theories from the general field of psychology and elsewhere, and much still hinges on what exactly is meant by "abnormal". There has traditionally been a divide between psychological and biological explanations, reflecting a philosophical dualism in regard to the mind-body problem. There have also been different approaches in trying to classify mental disorders. Abnormal includes three different categories; they are subnormal, supernormal and paranormal. 

Download the app now ! Learn Abnormal Psychology ebooks Offline today with Abnormal Psychology Books! - The only Abnormal Psychology Offline Books application you need !

title: Activity Mood Tracker
description:
Feeling unmotivated or sluggish? Tired or down in the dumps? According to psychological research, the one of the best pick-me-ups is to force yourself to perform meaningful, rewarding activities that will support long-term, positive mental health.

ReMotivate is a personalized random activity generator that aims to improve your mental health by helping you take action. It has two functions: one, to guide you in selecting and following through with your rewarding activity, and two, to track your mood before and after your selected activity. By tracking your activity history, you can then determine which ones provide you with the most mood-boosting power.  We hope that with ReMotivate, you can clear a path to happiness, satisfaction, and productivity.

-- 

Want more?

descriptionHTML:
Feeling unmotivated or sluggish? Tired or down in the dumps? According to psychological research, the one of the best pick-me-ups is to force yourself to perform meaningful, rewarding activities that will support long-term, positive mental health.

ReMotivate is a personalized random activity generator that aims to improve your mental health by helping you take action. It has two functions: one, to guide you in selecting and following through with your rewarding activity, and two, to track your mood before and after your selected activity. By tracking your activity history, you can then determine which ones provide you with the most mood-boosting power. We hope that with ReMotivate, you can clear a path to happiness, satisfaction, and productivity.

--

Want more?
ReMotivate is one of six components of an application suite called MoodTools. MoodTools aims to create a free, convenient, and easy-to-use Android smartphone application suite that provides empirically-supported tools to combat clinical depression on a large scale. Please be on the lookout for other MoodTools applications!

comments: great app, only request is that you can add more than 20 activities at a time
Could you ask for daily moods and add a year in pixels view?

I like the apps ideas. It can track relationship between activities & mood. Most useful & unique is that when you start an activity it places an icon in the task bar & records mood before starting the activity. When activity is complete, click the icon in the notification bar to make note of your new mood if it changed. Highly recomend but i wish it had a graph to show frequency of moods to activities & hrly reminder. Without that feature, I have to use pen and paper to look for corelations.

Really like this concept. Would be great if there was a way to track your mood during the activity as some things, like wasting hours watching pointless youtube videos, feel good at the time, but make you feel worse afterwards.
Simple format tremendous insights.
